00014 #define NOP() asm volatile("NOP\n\t" \
00015                 "NOP\n\t" \
00016                 "NOP\n\t" \

00018 
00019 void dbg_system_init(void) {
00020         volatile unsigned int StartUpCounter = 0;
00021         volatile unsigned int HSEStatus = 0;
00022         
00023 
00024         /* System Init */
00025         RCC->CR |= (unsigned int)0x00000001;
00026         RCC->CFGR &= (unsigned int)0xF8FF0000;
00027         RCC->CR &= (unsigned int)0xFEF6FFFF;
00028         RCC->CR &= (unsigned int)0xFFFBFFFF;
00029         RCC->CFGR &= (unsigned int)0xFF80FFFF;
00030         RCC->CIR = 0x00000000;
00031 
00032         RCC->CR |= RCC_CR_HSEON;
00033         do {
00034                 HSEStatus = RCC->CR & RCC_CR_HSERDY;
00035                 ++StartUpCounter;
00036         } while ((HSEStatus == 0) && (StartUpCounter != 0x0500));
00037         
00038         if ((RCC->CR & RCC_CR_HSERDY) != RESET)
00039                 HSEStatus = (unsigned int)0x01;
00040         else
00041                 HSEStatus = (unsigned int)0x00;
00042         if (HSEStatus == (unsigned int)0x01) {
00043                 /*!< Enable Prefetch Buffer */
00044                 FLASH->ACR |= FLASH_ACR_PRFTBE;
00045 
00046                 /*!< Flash 2 wait state */
00047                 FLASH->ACR &= (unsigned int)((unsigned int)~FLASH_ACR_LATENCY);
00048                 FLASH->ACR |= (unsigned int)FLASH_ACR_LATENCY_2;    
00049 
00050                 /*!< HCLK = SYSCLK */
00051                 RCC->CFGR |= (unsigned int)RCC_CFGR_HPRE_DIV1;
00052 
00053                 /*!< PCLK2 = HCLK */
00054                 RCC->CFGR |= (unsigned int)RCC_CFGR_PPRE2_DIV1;
00055 
00056                 /*!< PCLK1 = HCLK */
00057                 RCC->CFGR |= (unsigned int)RCC_CFGR_PPRE1_DIV2;
00058 
00059                 /*!< PLLCLK = 8MHz * 9 = 72 MHz */
00060                 RCC->CFGR &= (unsigned int)((unsigned int)~(RCC_CFGR_PLLSRC | RCC_CFGR_PLLXTPRE | RCC_CFGR_PLLMULL));
00061                 RCC->CFGR |= (unsigned int)(RCC_CFGR_PLLSRC | RCC_CFGR_PLLMULL9);
00062 
00063                 /*!< Enable PLL */
00064                 RCC->CR |= RCC_CR_PLLON;
00065 
00066                 /*!< Wait till PLL is ready */
00067                 while((RCC->CR & RCC_CR_PLLRDY) == 0) ;
00068 
00069                 /*!< Select PLL as system clock source */
00070                 RCC->CFGR &= (unsigned int)((unsigned int)~(RCC_CFGR_SW));
00071                 RCC->CFGR |= (unsigned int)RCC_CFGR_SW_PLL;    
00072 
00073                 /*!< Wait till PLL is used as system clock source */
00074                 while ((RCC->CFGR & (unsigned int)RCC_CFGR_SWS) != (unsigned int)0x08) ;
00075         } else {
00076                 while (1) ;
00077         }
00078 
00079 }
00080 
00081 void dbg_setup_uart_default(void) {
00082         unsigned int tmpreg;
00083 
00084         dbg_system_init();
00085 
00086         RCC->APB2ENR |= (RCC_APB2ENR_IOPAEN| RCC_APB2ENR_AFIOEN);
00087         RCC->APB2ENR |= RCC_APB2ENR_USART1EN;
00088 
00089         GPIO_CONF_OUTPUT_PORT(A, 9, ALT_PUSH_PULL, 50);
00090         GPIO_CONF_INPUT_PORT(A, 10, FLOATING);
00091 
00092         tmpreg = USART1->CR2;
00093         tmpreg &= 0xCFFF;       // 1 stop bit
00094         USART1->CR2 = tmpreg;
00095 
00096         tmpreg = USART1->CR1;
00097         tmpreg &= 0xE9F3;
00098         tmpreg |= 0x04 | 0x08;
00099         USART1->CR1 = tmpreg;
00100 
00101         tmpreg = USART1->CR3;
00102         tmpreg &= 0xFCFF;
00103         USART1->CR3 = tmpreg;
00104 
00105         USART1->BRR = 0x271;
00106 
00107         // Enable USART1
00108         USART1->CR1 |= (unsigned short)0x2000;
00109         
00110         // 使能引脚重映射功能
00111         RCC->APB2ENR |= RCC_APB2ENR_IOPAEN | RCC_APB2ENR_IOPBEN | RCC_APB2ENR_AFIOEN;
00112 }
00113 
00114 void rs232_send(char *buf, int length) {
00115         int i = 0;
00116         
00117         while (length--) {
00118                 USART1->DR = buf[i++] & (unsigned short)0x01FF;
00119                 while (!(USART1->SR & (unsigned short)0x0080)) ;
00120         }
00121 }
00122 
00123 void rs232_put(char c) {
00124         rs232_send(&c, 1);
00125 }
